question: According to the new report of the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI), which country is the world's second-largest arms producer?
explanation:
The noted Swedish research institute, Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI) has released a new report, which revealed that China is the world\'s second-largest producer of arms, only after the United States.
In the previous report of SIPRI, which was published in 2017, China was placed at the sixth place in the world. Whereas in the recent report, it is placed ahead of Russian companies, from whom China was importing arms earlier. The report also stated that four Chinese arms groups were ranked among the world\'s top 20 weapons sellers.
